docs.title: Home
docs.text:
GCLOUD CONNECTORS

Python utilities to simplify connection with Google APIs.

gcloud-connectors is a simple and efficient api wrapper to interact with Google APIs and Pandas

With a couple of code lines, it allows any Pandas user to take advantage of Google APIs.

gcloud-connectors also offers nice progress bars (available on Notebook and terminal) to get a rough idea of the remaining amount of computation to be done.

Without gcloud-connectors With gcloud-connectors

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
On Linux macOS & Windows, no special requirement rather than 

pip install gcloud-connectors

Example:

✅ Tested on Mac and Linux

import ...

Warning

Enviroment Variable is required to interact with any of Google wrapped classes

docs.title: When should I use gcloud-connectors, google-api-python or bigquery?
docs.text: pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming language.
